column4: is there a way of bypassing the recovery menu and going direcltly into a root shell prompt ?
: I had an issue with an ATI card and Ubuntu 11.10 boot issue witha blank screen I fixed it with the info here http://askubuntu.com/questions/38780/how-to-set-nomodeset-for-installation
thanks for the link.  unfortunately nomodeset really doesn't do anything for me.  I still get a blank screen after bootup
